dc22_pos_equal_1.mainQuestion: We have gone too far in pushing equal rights in this country.

dc22_pos_women_home.mainQuestion: Society would be better off if fewer women worked outside the home.

dc22_pos_hate_speech.mainQuestion: It should be illegal to say hateful things publicly about racial, ethnic and religious groups.

dc22_womenparl.mainQuestion: The best way to protect women's interests is to have more women in Parliament.

dc22_pos_experts.mainQuestion: I’d rather put my trust in the wisdom of ordinary people than the opinions of experts and intellectuals.

dc22_pos_lose_touch.mainQuestion: Those elected to Parliament soon lose touch with the people.

dc22_pos_pol_lie.mainQuestion: Politicians are willing to lie to get elected.

dc22_pos_career_pol.mainQuestion: Ordinary people, not career politicians, should make our most important policy decisions.

pos_protest_laws.mainQuestion: Canadians have a duty to protest laws and policies they believe are unjust.

pos_limit_protests.mainQuestion: Political protests are disruptive and should be limited.

dc22_pol_sys.mainQuestion: In general, the Canadian political system operates as it should.

dc22_pos_jobs.mainQuestion:
When
  there is a conflict between protecting the environment and creating jobs,
  jobs should come first.

dc22_canid1.mainQuestion: I have a lot in common with other Canadians

dc22_pos_group_id.mainQuestion:
My ethnicity is an important part of
my identity.

dc22_pos_assim.mainQuestion: Too many recent immigrants just don't want to fit in to Canadian society.

dc22_pos_take_jobs.mainQuestion: Immigrants take jobs away from other Canadians.

dc22_pos_look_after.mainQuestion: We should look after Canadians born in this country first and others second.

dc22_pos_ab_deserve.mainQuestion: Over the past few years, Indigenous peoples have gotten less than they deserve.

dc22_pos_ab_colonial.mainQuestion: Generations of colonialism and discrimination have created conditions that make it difficult for Indigenous peoples to work their way out of poverty.

dc22_pos_bilingualis.mainQuestion: We have gone too far in pushing bilingualism in Canada.

dc22_pos_relig_sym.mainQuestion: There should be restrictions on religious symbols in public life.

dc22_pos_no_differen.mainQuestion: Elections make no difference to what happens in this country.

pos_offensive_speech.mainQuestion: People should be able to say what they think even if it offends some people.
